Detailed Description

Non-copyable Mixin.

This mix-in class prevents objects of a class from being copy-constructed or assigned to each other. User can prohibit the class copying by inheriting from NonCopyable class as a private base class.

-example: class CopyProhibitedClass : private NonCopyable {};

This mix-in class prevents objects of a class from being copy-constructed or assigned to each other. User can prohibit the class copying by inheriting from NonCopyable class as a private base class.ã€€The CRTP (Curiously Recursive Template Pattern) version would be used for empty base optimization for multipe-inherited.

-example: class CopyProhibitedClass : private NonCopyable {};
